p: Specific warnings and precautions of use. Radix Platycodi reportedly depresses the central nervous system (CNS) ( Lee, 1975; WHO, 1989). Therefore, the concomitant use of this herbal medicine with alcohol or hypnotic and sedative drugs should be avoided. Overall, the safety is Medium, but there are no reports to infer that such herbal preparations may interfere with the disease or NSAIDs.
